00020 /*! file CELFileConversionOptions.cpp This file contains a class for options when converting CEL files. */
00021 
00022 #include "calvin_files/converters/cel/src/CELFileConversionOptions.h"
00023 
00024 namespace affymetrix_cel_converter
00025 {
00026 
00027   /*! Constructor */
00028 CELFileConversionOptions::CELFileConversionOptions()
00029 {
00030   m_ChipType = NULL;
00031   m_DATFileName = NULL;
00032 }
00033 
00034 std::string CELFileConversionOptions::newDatName(const std::string &datHeader, const std::string &newName)
00035 {
00036   std::string s;
00037 
00038   int start = datHeader.find("]  ", 0);
00039   if (start == std::string::npos) {
00040     std::string empty;
00041     return empty;
00042   } else {
00043     start += 3;
00044   }
00045 
00046   int stop = datHeader.find(":CLS", 0);
00047   if (stop == std::string::npos) {
00048     std::string empty;
00049     return empty;
00050   } else {
00051     stop -= 1;
00052   }
00053 
00054   s = datHeader.substr(0, start) + newName + datHeader.substr(stop + 1);
00055 
00056   return s;
00057 }
00058 
00059 };
